00029 struct MASK_ITERATOR {
00030         unsigned mask;
00031         unsigned icursor;
00032         enum state { MI_IDLE, MI_STARTED, MI_FINISHED } state;
00033 };
00034 
00035 int hasNext( struct MASK_ITERATOR* it ) {
00036         unsigned next_cursor = 0;
00037 
00038         switch( it->state ){
00039         case MI_IDLE:
00040                 next_cursor = 0x80000000;
00041                 it->icursor = 31;
00042                 break;
00043         case MI_STARTED:
00044                 next_cursor = (1 << it->icursor) >> 1;
00045                 break;
00046         case MI_FINISHED:
00047                 return 0;
00048         }
00049         for ( ; next_cursor != 0; next_cursor >>= 1 ){
00050                 if ( it->mask & next_cursor ){
00051                         return 1;
00052                 }
00053         }
00054 
00055         return 0;
00056 }
00057 int getNext( struct MASK_ITERATOR* it ) {
00058         unsigned next_cursor = 0;
00059 
00060         switch( it->state ){
00061         case MI_IDLE:
00062                 next_cursor = 0x80000000;
00063                 it->state = MI_STARTED;
00064                 it->icursor = 31;
00065                 break;
00066         case MI_STARTED:
00067                 next_cursor = 1 << --it->icursor;
00068                 break;
00069         case MI_FINISHED:
00070                 return -1;
00071         }
00072         for ( ; next_cursor != 0; next_cursor >>= 1, --it->icursor ){
00073                 if ( it->mask & next_cursor ){
00074                         return it->icursor;
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 
00078         it->state = MI_FINISHED;
00079         return -1;
00080 }

00083 
00084 int acq200_intsDisable( unsigned irqs )
00086 {
00087         struct MASK_ITERATOR it = { irqs };
00088 
00089         while ( hasNext( &it ) ){
00090                 disable_irq_nosync( getNext( &it ) );
00091         }
00092         return 0;
00093 }
00094 int acq200_intsEnable( unsigned irqs )
00096 {
00097         struct MASK_ITERATOR it = { irqs };
00098 
00099         while ( hasNext( &it ) ){
00100                 enable_irq( getNext( &it ) );
00101         }
00102         return 0;
00103 }
00104 
00105 static unsigned get_mask(char mdef)
00106 {
00107         char cb[2];
00108         cb[0] = mdef;
00109         cb[1] = '\0';
00110         return simple_strtoul(cb, 0, 16);
00111 }
00112 
00113 int acq200_intsMask(struct Acq200Device* device)
00117 {
00118         int inew = strlen(device->imask) -1;    /* index new mask from back */
00119         int ia = 0;
00120         int irq = 0;
00121 
00122         for (ia = NR_IRQS/4-1; ia >= 0; --ia, --inew){
00123                 unsigned new_mask = inew>=0? get_mask(device->imask[inew]): 0;
00124                 unsigned active_mask = device->imask_a[ia];
00125                 int bit;
00126 
00127                 for (bit = 0x1; (bit & 0x0f) != 0; bit <<= 1, ++irq){
00128 
00129                         dbg(2+((!(new_mask&bit))&&(active_mask&bit)),
00130                                 "%d %s %s",
00131                                 irq,
00132                                 (new_mask&bit)? "DISABLE":
00133                                 (active_mask&bit)? "enable": "NOT MINE",
00134                                 acq200_debug > 2? "STUB":"");
00135                         if (acq200_debug > 2) continue;
00136 
00137                         if (new_mask&bit){
00138                                 disable_irq_nosync(irq);
00139                                 active_mask |= bit;
00140                         }else{
00141                                 if (active_mask&bit){
00142                                         enable_irq(irq);
00143                                         active_mask &= ~bit;
00144                                 }
00145                         }
00146                 }
00147                 device->imask_a[ia] = active_mask;
00148         }
00149 
00150         return 0;
00151 }

00153 int acq200_bkl(struct Acq200Device* device, int bkl_action)
00154 {
00155         switch(bkl_action){
00156         case BKL_LOCK:
00157                 spin_lock_irqsave(&device->bkl.lock, device->bkl.flags);
00158                 device->bkl.is_locked = 1;
00159                 break;
00160         case BKL_UNLOCK:
00161                 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&device->bkl.lock, device->bkl.flags);
00162                 device->bkl.is_locked = 0;
00163                 info();
00164                 break;
00165         case BKL_QUERY:
00166         default:
00167                 ;
00168         }
00169         return device->bkl.is_locked;
00170 }
